name: Tempus (Hotdog647)
description:
Time is falling apart, and it is up to you to put it back together

This game was done for the Indie Tales Gam Jam, the theme of which was one room. In this game you will have to switch between time periods of the same room to make progress and restore time to it's natural state. 

I fell to scope creep real hard in this one, as you probably noticed when you look at the pixel art, lack of music, and short length of the game. If anyone has any tips on how to get better at pixel art or how to make music, please let me know.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Spacebar for jump

Escape for pause
